detectors.description:
HardcodedCrowdsale.preICOBuy() (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02d3aea48b443a0026ed9cbc91b97d7335aba323_HardcodedCrowdsale.sol#220-241) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- balanceOf(_for) == 0 (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02d3aea48b443a0026ed9cbc91b97d7335aba323_HardcodedCrowdsale.sol#229)

HardcodedCrowdsale.preICOBuy() (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02d3aea48b443a0026ed9cbc91b97d7335aba323_HardcodedCrowdsale.sol#220-241) ignores return value by managedTokenLedger.mint(_for,tokensBought) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02d3aea48b443a0026ed9cbc91b97d7335aba323_HardcodedCrowdsale.sol#232)

HardcodedCrowdsale.refundPreICO() (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02d3aea48b443a0026ed9cbc91b97d7335aba323_HardcodedCrowdsale.sol#251-260) ignores return value by managedTokenLedger.demint(msg.sender,tokenValue) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02d3aea48b443a0026ed9cbc91b97d7335aba323_HardcodedCrowdsale.sol#257)

HardcodedCrowdsale.setLedger(address) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02d3aea48b443a0026ed9cbc91b97d7335aba323_HardcodedCrowdsale.sol#168-174) should emit an event for: 
	- decimals = managedTokenLedger.decimals() (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02d3aea48b443a0026ed9cbc91b97d7335aba323_HardcodedCrowdsale.sol#171) 
	- DECIMAL_MULTIPLIER = 10 ** uint256(decimals) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02d3aea48b443a0026ed9cbc91b97d7335aba323_HardcodedCrowdsale.sol#172)

Reentrancy in HardcodedCrowdsale.preICOBuy() (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02d3aea48b443a0026ed9cbc91b97d7335aba323_HardcodedCrowdsale.sol#220-241):
	External calls:
	- balanceOf(_for) == 0 (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02d3aea48b443a0026ed9cbc91b97d7335aba323_HardcodedCrowdsale.sol#229)
		- managedTokenLedger.balanceOf(_owner) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02d3aea48b443a0026ed9cbc91b97d7335aba323_HardcodedCrowdsale.sol#142)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- preICOcontributors = preICOcontributors + 1 (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02d3aea48b443a0026ed9cbc91b97d7335aba323_HardcodedCrowdsale.sol#230)
